title: Nagila Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Middle Eastern, Kosher, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Kosher pizza, falafel, and salad restaurant that's all veg except for fish. Offers many vegan choices, though be sure to confirm as some food might contain mayonaise. Has a vegan shawarma, veggie burger, and vegan suitable sides. No vegan cheese for pizza. NOTE: There are 2 sides to this place with separate entrances, one is for dairy vegetarian, the other is meat; this listing is for the dairy vegetarian part of the restaurant.
